header.title: World Geography Game
header.subTitle: Learn about or rediscover over 200 countries all over the globe!
header.description: Find countries from their name, capital city or flag. Learn or review your geography in a simple way.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Find the country by the name, capital city or flag given on the top of the page.
gettingStarted.info: During the game, you can find the following information on the top of the page:
